meanings.definition: A game of chance in which players purchase tickets and select a set of numbers in hopes of winning a prize.
meanings.sent1: I bought a lotto ticket for the big jackpot.
meanings.sent2: She always plays the lotto on Fridays with her lucky numbers.
meanings.sent3: The cat accidentally knocked over my lotto ticket!
meanings.sent4: Winning the lotto felt like a dream come true.
meanings.sent5: The excitement of the lotto draw filled the room.

meanings.definition: A system of betting on the outcome of a lottery.
meanings.sent1: The lotto system allows you to predict the winning numbers.
meanings.sent2: He used a special strategy to place his bets in the lotto.
meanings.sent3: I joked that my dog could pick better lotto numbers than me.
meanings.sent4: In life, we all play our own version of the lotto.
meanings.sent5: The anticipation of the lotto results kept everyone on edge.
